item.title: What the future will bring
item.description: A look ahead at atomic power.
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: Safety and health
item.description: Addressing safety and health issues. Includes some unidentified critics/skeptics of nuclear industry. G. Hoyt Whittle, University of Rochester, comments on "acceptable risk" of nuclear power.
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: Argonne National Laboratory
item.description: This program features Dr. Donald Tandam, Purdue University; John M. West, project manager, Experimental Boiling Water Reactor; W.H. Zinn, director, Argonne National Laboratory; and Leonard J. Koch, Argonne National Laboratory.
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: Sodium graphite reactor
item.description: Dr. Donald Tendam, Purdue University; Dr. Sidney Siegel (or Segal), Atomics International; Dr. W.E. Parkins, Atomics International; Dr. Chauncey Starr, general manager, Atomics International
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: The power picture
item.description: Admiral Lewis Strauss, chairman, U.S. Atomic Energy Commission; Sir John Cockcroft, British Atomic Energy Commission
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: Oak Ridge experiment
item.description: This program discusses experiments conducted at Oak Ridge National Laboratory. The primary guest is Dr. Alvin M. Weinberg, director of the Oak Ridge National Laboratory.
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Fossil fuels

item.title: International atom - France
item.description: Francis Perrin, high commissioner, Atomic Energy in France; Monsieur J. Yvon, director, Reactor Research; Monsieur P. Ailleret, Research Director, Electricite de France.
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: From ore to atom
item.description: Oliver Townsend, Atomic Industrial Forum (also appears in 717); Dr. Donald Tendam, Purdue University
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: International atom - Canada
item.description: J.L. Gray, vice president, Atomic Energy of Canada; Dr. David A. Keys, consultant to the president; Dr. C.A. Mawson, acting director, biology division.
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: The first pile
item.description: This program features Dr. Donald Tandam, Purdue University and a dramatization of the first nuclear fission experiments.
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: Pressurized water reactor
item.description: This program features J.C. Engel, Westinghouse Broadcasting Company Electric Corporation; P.G. DeHuff, Westinghouse Broadcasting Company; and Admiral Lewis Strauss, chairman, U.S. Atomic Energy Commission.
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: Atomic propulsion
item.description: Atomic power for ships, airplanes, submarines, locomotives, rockets.
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: International atom: England
item.description: Sir John Cockcroft, British Atomic Energy Commission; Sir Christopher Hinton, managing director, Industrial Group; Richard Moore, designer, Calder Hall.
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: The romance of uranium
item.description: Dr. Homi Bhabha, President, Geneva Conference on Atomic Power; Dr. A.H. Lange, Canada; Frank W. Stead, U.S. Geological Survey; Sir John Cockcroft, Great Britain; Gordon Dean, U.S. Atomic Energy Commission
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.

item.title: The economic atom
item.description: This program features President Dwight D. Eisenhower; Gordon Dean, U.S. Atomic Energy Commission; Sir John Cockcroft, Great Britain; Charles Robbins, Atomic Industrial Forum; and Dr. James Lane, Oak Ridge National Laboratory.
item.dc:creator: McMahon, Bob
item.dc:subject: Renewable energy sources.
